```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets) 
data("brfss_smart2010")
```



```{r q2_cleaning,warning=FALSE}
dict_resp = c("Poor",
              "Fair",
              "Good",
              "Very good",
              "Excellent")

brfss_df = brfss_smart2010 |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  filter(topic == "Overall Health" & response == dict_resp) |> 
  mutate(
    response,
    response = factor(
      response,
      levels = dict_resp,
      ordered = TRUE)) |> 
  mutate(state = locationabbr,
         county = locationdesc)
```
```{r}
result_2002 = brfss_df |> 
  filter(year == 2002) |> 
  distinct(state,county)|>  
  count(state) |> 
  filter(n>7) |> 
  pull(state) |> 
  print()

result_2001 = brfss_df |> 
  filter(year == 2001)|> 
  distinct(state,county) |> 
  count(state) |> 
  filter(n>7) |> 
  pull(state) |> 
  print()

```
